events.message: I am filing a claim after my car was involved in a collision with another vehicle last evening. The accident caused significant damage to the front bumper and left headlight.
The submitted claim has been categorised as an Auto Accident case. This classification will help in assigning the correct investigation and repair team.
An agent specializing in vehicular accidents has been assigned to handle this claim and will contact the customer shortly for further details.
We have formally acknowledged the receipt of your auto accident claim and assured a prompt review to expedite processing.
To proceed with the evaluation, please submit the police report, photos of the damage, and a copy of your vehicle registration.
The customer has provided all the necessary documents including the police report, accident photos, and vehicle registration copy as requested.
The investigation team has begun assessing the accident details, vehicle damage, and reviewing all submitted documents.
Investigation into the auto accident claim is now complete with findings confirming the extent of damage and liability.
A settlement proposal has been sent to the customer detailing the amount to cover repairs and related expenses from the collision.
The customer has responded positively to the settlement offer, expressing satisfaction with the proposed compensation amount.
Following the customer's acceptance, the claim has been officially approved for payment and repair work to begin.
The settlement amount has been processed and payment issued to the customerâ€™s account for repair costs of the damaged vehicle.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed after payment was received and repairs were confirmed completed.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived securely for future reference in this auto accident case.
